response: "{ \"title\": \"Longest Common Prefix\", \"description\": \"Write a function `longest_common_prefix` that takes two strings `str1` and `str2` as input. The function should return the length of the longest common prefix between `str1` and `str2`.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```\\ndef longest_common_prefix(str1: str, str2: str) -> int:\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `str1` (str): The first string.\\n- `str2` (str): The second string.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns the length of the longest common prefix between `str1` and `str2`.\\n\\n\", \"code\": \"def longest_common_prefix(str1: str, str2: str) -> int:\\n    i = 0\\n    while i < len(str1) and i < len(str2):\\n        if str1[i] != str2[i]:\\n            return i\\n        i += 1\\n    return i\\n\", \"tests\": [\"assert longest_common_prefix('abc123', 'abxyz') == 3\", \"assert longest_common_prefix('hello', 'world') == 0\", \"assert longest_common_prefix('abcd', 'abcde') == 4\", \"assert longest_common_prefix('', '') == 0\"] }"
